name: part_011
file: tmp_≪DREAMCATCHER 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday Celebration 2024! #BaeDay2024 [TQSikoeVXoE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: The audience chants for an encore in the dark arena.
Hakos Baelz returns to the stage for the encore MC segment, thanking the fans and introducing the final song.

subtitles.original: Who was that I heard?
subtitles.english: Who was that I heard?

subtitles.original: Did you want an encore?
subtitles.english: Did you want an encore?

subtitles.original: My heart is still shaking...
subtitles.english: My heart is still shaking...

subtitles.original: ...but it's okay!
subtitles.english: ...but it's okay!

subtitles.original: Because we still have one more song.
subtitles.english: Because we still have one more song.

subtitles.original: We have time for one more song until the end of the show.
subtitles.english: We have time for one more song until the end of the show.

subtitles.original: I wanted to finish off with a bang!
subtitles.english: I wanted to finish off with a bang!

subtitles.original: Um, and I would like to perform one more song for you guys as the encore song.
subtitles.english: Um, and I would like to perform one more song for you guys as the encore song.

subtitles.original: And it's a very important song to me, very special to my heart.
subtitles.english: And it's a very important song to me, very special to my heart.

subtitles.original: So I hope you'll listen.
subtitles.english: So I hope you'll listen.

subtitles.original: はい、どうぞ！ かくれんぼ！
subtitles.english: All right, here it is! Kakurenbo!

subtitles.original: いっせーので鳴り響く　スタートの合図
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go! The signal to start rings out

subtitles.original: 点と線で結んだ世界　色づいていくここから
subtitles.english: The world connected by dots and lines begins to take on color from here

subtitles.original:
かくれんぼ
Lyrics: TKT Composition: EREN
subtitles.english:
Kakurenbo
Lyrics: TKT Composition: EREN

subtitles.original: 転んで転がる頃　既にここにあった
subtitles.english: By the time I tumbled and rolled, it was already right here

subtitles.original: 僕じゃない誰かの記憶が　呼び人と共に蘇る
subtitles.english: Someone else's memories, not mine, resurface along with the one calling

subtitles.original: 古ぼけた絵本を取り出して
subtitles.english: Taking out an old, worn-out picture book

subtitles.original: 落書きの中に一つの　答えを見つけた
subtitles.english: Among the scribbles, I found a single answer

subtitles.original: 自分の価値に目を疑って　どこまでだって落ちていけるの
subtitles.english: Doubting my own worth, wondering how far down I can fall

subtitles.original: どこか遠くに消えてしまいたい　こんな世界じゃ僕は要らない
subtitles.english: Wanting to disappear somewhere far away, I'm not needed in a world like this

subtitles.original: カウントダウンが始まっているよ
subtitles.english: The countdown has already begun

subtitles.original: いっせーので声を上げて　聞こえてくるんだ
subtitles.english: Ready, set, shout! I can hear it coming

subtitles.original: 自分の影の長さに気付く　もうこんな時間だ
subtitles.english: Noticing the length of my own shadow, it's already that time

subtitles.original: 一等星が顔を出した　届きそうで手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: A first-magnitude star peeked out, I reached out my hand as if it were within reach

subtitles.original: 次は僕についてきなよと　どんな暗闇でも
subtitles.english: "Follow me next," even in the darkness

subtitles.original: もういいかい？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: まだだよ
subtitles.english: Not yet

subtitles.original: 幕は上がり出した
subtitles.english: The curtain has begun to rise

subtitles.original: もういいかい？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: まーだだよ
subtitles.english: Not yet

subtitles.original: 色づいていくここから
subtitles.english: Taking on color from here

subtitles.original: 10年後の僕らは　すれ違いばかりで
subtitles.english: Ten years from now, we'll probably just be passing each other by

subtitles.original: 幻想に思いを馳せては　戻れないそう思い込んだ
subtitles.english: Lost in fantasies, I convinced myself there was no going back

subtitles.original: くたびれた心に追いつきを　あの頃と変わらない夕陽も
subtitles.english: Catching up with my worn-out heart, even the sunset hasn't changed since then

subtitles.original: なんとも思わない
subtitles.english: I don't feel a thing

subtitles.original: 自分を信じ歩いていければ　どこまでだって登れるのに
subtitles.english: If I could just believe in myself and keep walking, I could climb to any height

subtitles.original: あどけなくその空白に　大切なもの見落としている
subtitles.english: In that blank space, I'm overlooking something important

subtitles.original: 見つけられないと泣き喚く君へ
subtitles.english: To you, who cries out that you can't find it

subtitles.original: いっせーので声を上げて　聞こえてくるんだ
subtitles.english: Ready, set, shout! I can hear it coming

subtitles.original: 自分の影の長さに気付く　もうこんな時間だ
subtitles.english: Noticing the length of my own shadow, it's already that time

subtitles.original: 一生懸命駆け抜ける君　俯いてただけの僕でも
subtitles.english: You, who runs through it all, even for someone like me who just hung my head

subtitles.original: 君の前を歩けるから　こんな頼りない僕でも
subtitles.english: I can walk ahead of you, even if I'm this unreliable

subtitles.original: 宝箱は埃を　被ったまま失くした
subtitles.english: The treasure chest was lost, still covered in dust

subtitles.original: 鍵はずっと君の　ポケットの中にあった
subtitles.english: The key was in your pocket all along

subtitles.original: 散らばっていた全てが　今一つに重なる
subtitles.english: Everything that was scattered now overlaps as one

subtitles.original: 手を取り始めよう　僕たちの物語
subtitles.english: Let's take hands and begin our story
